metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for multi-perspective analysis, code review, output styling, and session coordination

plugins.name: panel-system
plugins.description: Dynamic multi-perspective analysis with 3 core roles + recruited specialists. Supports --format (github/json/markdown) and --context flags. Consensus tracking with percentage thresholds.

plugins.name: code
plugins.description: Development workflows: orchestration patterns, code review, TDD, and specialized agents. Includes /code:review command, architect and codebase-historian agents, quality gates, Socratic planning, and swarm recipes.

plugins.name: write
plugins.description: Creative writing workflows: prose craft, worldbuilding, editing, AI detection, and storytelling agents. Includes 10 agents (fiction-writer, prose-analysis, ai-detector, intimacy-designer, manuscript-editor, outline-architect, prose-writer, consistency-checker, developmental-editor, line-editor) with chapter/manuscript/character recipes.

plugins.name: output-styles
plugins.description: Switchable output styles for Claude Code responses. Includes 8 styles (ultra-concise, bullet-points, genui, html-structured, markdown-focused, table-based, tts-summary, yaml-structured) with /style command.

plugins.name: asha
plugins.description: Cognitive scaffold framework for session coordination and memory persistence. Provides /asha:init, /asha:save, /asha:note, /asha:status, /asha:index, /asha:cleanup commands, partner-sentiment and task-manager agents, scratchpad notes, session monitoring, vector DB semantic search, and ReAct pattern analysis (--react flag).

plugins.name: image
plugins.description: Image generation workflows: Stable Diffusion prompt engineering, ComfyUI workflow design, parameter optimization, and LoRA/model selection for AI art generation.
